input: Perform a batch operation to create, update, and retrieve complex lock requests with multiple conditions.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

POST /BankCustomerLockRequests HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json

{"PartyIdentifyingElements":{"PartyUUID":"23456789-01ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef"},"EventCode":"108000","UserStatusCode":"3","ValidityStartDate":"2023-10-17","ValidityEndDate":"2024-12-31","BankAccountContracts":[{"UUID":"abcdef12-3456-7890-abcd-ef1234567890","TypeCode":"874","SubTypeCode":"1"}],"Note":"Complex lock involving multiple contracts."}

--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

PATCH /BankCustomerLockRequests/720 HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json

{"UserStatusCode":"5","BusinessProcessChainAssignment":{"BusinessProcessChainUUID":"87654321-12ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef"}}

--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /BankCustomerLockRequests/910?$expand=BankAccountEntryLockInstructions HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json

--request-separator--
